attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government want to have over 50% of young people go to University within the next few years. However, many are put off by the thought of leaving in so much debt (imagine a 4 year course with topup fees alone will cost in the reigon of £12000 - without living costs!) This will limit those able to go to Uni to the richer people, preventing those who may be intelligent but less financially able

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reduce/scrap University Topup/Tuition Fees."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13972.asp

Prime Minister's Office
